query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Ricorditi, lettor, se mai ne l’alpe 2 ti colse nebbia per la qual vedessi 3 non altrimenti che per pelle talpe,
4 come, quando i vapori umidi e spessi 5 a diradar cominciansi, la spera 6 del sol debilemente entra per essi;
7 e fia la tua imagine leggera 8 in giugnere a veder com’ io rividi 9 lo sole in pria, che già nel corcar era.
query.result:
**English:**
1 Remember, reader, if ever in the Alps 2 a fog caught you through which you saw 3 no differently than moles through their skin,
4 how, when the vapors are thick and humid 5 at daybreak, the sphere 6 of the sun enters through them weakly;
7 and your feeble imagination 8 will suffice to see how I saw again 9 the sun, which was already setting.
**Malay:**
1 Ingatlah, pembaca, jika suatu ketika di Pegunungan Alpen 2 kabut menyelimutimu sehingga kau melihat 3 tidak jauh berbeda dengan tahi lalat melalui kulitnya,
4 bagaimana, ketika uap lembap dan tebal 5 mulai menipis di waktu fajar, bola 6 matahari masuk dengan lemah melaluinya;
7 dan imajinasimu yang lemah 8 akan cukup untuk melihat bagaimana aku melihat lagi 9 matahari, yang sudah terbenam.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Sì, pareggiando i miei co’ passi fidi 11 del mio maestro, usci’ fuor di tal nube 12 ai raggi morti già ne’ bassi lidi.
query.result:
**English:**
10 Yes, equaling my faithful steps with his, 11 my master's, I emerged from such a cloud 12 to the rays already dead on the low shores.
**Malay:**
10 Ya, menyamakan langkah-langkah setiaku dengan langkah-langkahnya, 11 guruku, aku keluar dari awan tersebut 12 ke cahaya matahari yang sudah redup di ufuk rendah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 O imaginativa che ne rube 14 talvolta sì di fuor, ch’om non s’accorge 15 perché dintorno suonin mille tube,
16 chi move te, se ’l senso non ti porge? 17 Moveti lume che nel ciel s’informa, 18 per sé o per voler che giù lo scorge.
query.result:
**English:**
13 O imagination, which sometimes 14 so steals us away from ourselves 15 that we do not notice 16 even if a thousand trumpets sound around us,
17 what moves you, if the senses do not provide it? 18 You are moved by a light that forms in the sky, 19 either by itself or by a will that sends it down.
**Malay:**
13 Wahai imaginasi, yang terkadang 14 begitu mencuri kita dari diri kita sendiri 15 sehingga kita tidak menyadarinya 16 meskipun seribu terompet berbunyi di sekitar kita,
17 apa yang menggerakkanmu, jika indra tidak menyediakannya? 18 Engkau digerakkan oleh cahaya yang terbentuk di langit, 19 baik oleh dirinya sendiri atau oleh keinginan yang mengirimkannya ke bawah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 E come questa imagine rompeo 32 sé per sé stessa, a guisa d’una bulla 33 cui manca l’acqua sotto qual si feo,
34 surse in mia visïone una fanciulla 35 piangendo forte, e dicea: «O regina, 36 perché per ira hai voluto esser nulla?
37 Ancisa t’hai per non perder Lavina; 38 or m’hai perduta! Io son essa che lutto, 39 madre, a la tua pria ch’a l’altrui ruina».
query.result:
**English:**
31 And as this image bursts 32 by itself, like a bubble 33 from which the water underneath has fled,
34 a young woman appeared in my vision, 35 weeping loudly, and saying: "O queen, 36 why have you wished to be nothing out of anger?
37 You have killed yourself so as not to lose Lavinia; 38 now you have lost me! I am the one who grieves, 39 mother, at your ruin before anyone else's."
**Malay:**
31 Dan seperti gambaran ini pecah 32 dengan sendirinya, seperti gelembung 33 yang airnya di bawahnya telah hilang,
34 seorang gadis muda muncul dalam penglihatanku, 35 menangis dengan keras, dan berkata: "O ratu, 36 mengapa karena amarah Anda ingin menjadi bukan apa-apa?
37 Anda telah membunuh diri Anda sendiri agar tidak kehilangan Lavinia; 38 sekarang Anda telah kehilangan saya! Saya adalah orang yang berduka, 39 ibu, atas kehancuran Anda sebelum kehancuran orang lain."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 Ma come al sol che nostra vista grava 53 e per soverchio sua figura vela, 54 così la mia virtù quivi mancava.
query.result:
**English:**
52 But as the sun, which weighs down our sight 53 and veils its own form with its excess of light, 54 so my powers failed me there.
**Malay:**
52 Tetapi seperti matahari, yang membebani penglihatan kita 53 dan dengan cahaya yang berlebihan itu menyembunyikan wujudnya sendiri, 54 maka kekuatanku pun gagal di sana.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
55 «Questo è divino spirito, che ne la 56 via da ir sù ne drizza sanza prego, 57 e col suo lume sé medesmo cela.
query.result:
**English:**
55 "This is a divine spirit, who on 56 the way up directs us without being asked, 57 and with his light conceals himself.
**Malay:**
55 "Ini adalah roh ilahi, yang di 56 jalan untuk naik mengarahkan kita tanpa diminta, 57 dan dengan cahayanya menyembunyikan dirinya sendiri.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 Sì fa con noi, come l’uom si fa sego; 59 ché quale aspetta prego e l’uopo vede, 60 malignamente già si mette al nego.
query.result:
**English:**
58 He acts toward us as a man acts toward a hedge, 59 for when he sees a branch in need and waits for a request, 60 he wickedly sets himself to deny it.
**Malay:**
58 Dia bertindak terhadap kita, seperti manusia bertindak terhadap pagar, 59 karena ketika dia melihat dahan yang membutuhkan dan menunggu permintaan, 60 dia dengan jahatnya bersiap untuk menolaknya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 Or accordiamo a tanto invito il piede; 62 procacciam di salir pria che s’abbui, 63 ché poi non si poria, se ’l dì non riede».
query.result:
**English:**
61 Now let us yield our feet to such an invitation; 62 let us hasten to climb before it gets dark, 63 for then it would not be possible, if the day does not return.
**Malay:**
61 Sekarang mari kita langkahkan kaki kita untuk undangan seperti itu; 62 bergegaslah untuk mendaki sebelum hari menjadi gelap, 63 karena nanti tidak mungkin, jika hari tidak kembali.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 Così disse il mio duca, e io con lui 65 volgemmo i nostri passi ad una scala; 66 e tosto ch’io al primo grado fui,
67 senti’mi presso quasi un muover d’ala 68 e ventarmi nel viso e dir: ‘Beati 69 pacifici, che son sanz’ ira mala!’.
query.result:
**English:**
64 Thus said my guide, and I with him 65 turned our steps to a staircase; 66 and as soon as I was on the first step,
67 I heard near me almost a movement of wings 68 and a breath of wind on my face and a voice saying: ‘Blessed 69 are the peacemakers, who are without evil anger!’.
**Malay:**
64 Demikian kata pemanduku, dan aku bersamanya 65 mengarahkan langkah kami ke sebuah tangga; 66 dan segera setelah aku berada di anak tangga pertama,
67 kudengar di dekatku hampir seperti gerakan sayap 68 dan hembusan angin di wajahku dan suara berkata: ‘Berbahagialah 69 para pembawa damai, yang tanpa amarah jahat!’.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 Già eran sovra noi tanto levati 71 li ultimi raggi che la notte segue, 72 che le stelle apparivan da più lati.
query.result:
**English:**
70 Already the last rays which the night follows 71 were rising so high above us, 72 that the stars were appearing on many sides.
**Malay:**
70 Sinar-sinar terakhir yang diikuti oleh malam 71 telah terbit begitu tinggi di atas kami, 72 sehingga bintang-bintang tampak dari banyak sisi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 ‘O virtù mia, perché sì ti dilegue?’, 74 fra me stesso dicea, ché mi sentiva 75 la possa de le gambe posta in triegue.
query.result:
**English:**
73 "O my virtue, why do you abandon me so?", 74 I said to myself, for I felt 75 the strength of my legs put to a truce.
**Malay:**
73 "Wahai kebajikan, mengapa engkau meninggalkanku?", 74 kataku pada diriku sendiri, karena aku merasakan 75 kekuatan kakiku lumpuh.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
76 Noi eravam dove più non saliva 77 la scala sù, ed eravamo affissi, 78 pur come nave ch’a la piaggia arriva.
query.result:
**English:**
76 We were where the path no longer ascended, 77 and we were stuck, 78 just like a ship that reaches the shore.
**Malay:**
76 Kami berada di tempat yang jalannya tidak lagi menanjak, 77 dan kami tertahan, 78 seperti kapal yang sampai di pantai.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
79 E io attesi un poco, s’io udissi 80 alcuna cosa nel novo girone; 81 poi mi volsi al maestro mio, e dissi:
82 «Dolce mio padre, dì, quale offensione 83 si purga qui nel giro dove semo? 84 Se i piè si stanno, non stea tuo sermone».
query.result:
**English:**
79 And I waited a little, to see if I heard 80 anything in the new circle; 81 then I turned to my master and said:
82 "My sweet father, tell me, what offense 83 is purged here in the circle where we are? 84 If our feet are standing still, let not your speech stand still."
**Malay:**
79 Dan aku menunggu sebentar, untuk melihat apakah aku mendengar 80 sesuatu di lingkaran yang baru; 81 kemudian aku berpaling kepada guruku, dan berkata:
82 "Ayahku yang manis, katakan, pelanggaran apakah 83 yang disucikan di sini di lingkaran tempat kita berada? 84 Jika kaki kita berdiri diam, jangan biarkan ucapanmu berdiri diam."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
85 Ed elli a me: «L’amor del bene, scemo 86 del suo dover, quiritta si ristora; 87 qui si ribatte il mal tardato remo.
query.result:
**English:**
85 And he to me: "The love of good, bereft 86 of its duty, is here restored; 87 here is the delayed oar beaten again.
**Malay:**
85 Dan dia kepadaku: "Cinta kebaikan, kehilangan 86 tugasnya, di sini dipulihkan; 87 di sini dayung yang tertunda dipukul lagi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
88 Ma perché più aperto intendi ancora, 89 volgi la mente a me, e prenderai 90 alcun buon frutto di nostra dimora».
query.result:
**English:**
88 But so that you may understand more clearly, 89 turn your mind to me, and you will receive 90 some good fruit from our conversation.
**Malay:**
88 Tetapi agar kamu dapat memahami dengan lebih jelas, 89 arahkan pikiranmu kepadaku, dan kamu akan menerima 90 beberapa buah yang baik dari percakapan kita.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 «Né creator né creatura mai», 92 cominciò el, «figliuol, fu sanza amore, 93 o naturale o d’animo; e tu ’l sai.
query.result:
**English:**
91 "Neither creator nor creature ever," 92 he began, "my son, was without love, 93 either natural or of the mind; and you know it.
**Malay:**
91 "Tidak ada pencipta atau makhluk yang pernah," 92 mulailah dia, "anakku, tanpa cinta, 93 baik alami atau dari hati; dan kamu tahu itu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
94 Lo naturale è sempre sanza errore, 95 ma l’altro puote errar per malo obietto 96 o per troppo o per poco di vigore.
query.result:
**English:**
94 The natural is always without error, 95 but the other can err because of a bad object 96 or because of too much or too little vigor.
**Malay:**
94 Yang alami selalu tanpa kesalahan, 95 tetapi yang lainnya dapat salah karena objek yang buruk 96 atau karena terlalu banyak atau terlalu sedikit kekuatan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 Quinci comprender puoi ch’esser convene 104 amor sementa in voi d’ogne virtute 105 e d’ogne operazion che merta pene.
query.result:
**English:**
103 Hence you can understand that it is fitting 104 that love sows in you the seed of every virtue 105 and of every deed that deserves punishment.
**Malay:**
103 Oleh karena itu kamu dapat memahami bahwa adalah pantas 104 cinta menabur benih setiap kebaikan 105 dan setiap perbuatan yang pantas dihukum.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
112 Resta, se dividendo bene stimo, 113 che ’l mal che s’ama è del prossimo; ed esso 114 amor nasce in tre modi in vostro limo.
query.result:
**English:**
112 If I judge correctly by dividing things well, 113 the evil that is loved is that of one's neighbor; and this 114 love is born in your clay in three ways.
**Malay:**
112 Jika aku menilai dengan benar dengan membagi dengan baik, 113 kejahatan yang dicintai adalah kejahatan sesama; dan cinta ini 114 lahir dalam tanah liat kalian dalam tiga cara.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 Questo triforme amor qua giù di sotto 125 si piange: or vo’ che tu de l’altro intende, 126 che corre al ben con ordine corrotto.
query.result:
**English:**
124 This threefold love is lamented down here below: 125 now I want you to understand about the other, 126 which runs to good with a corrupt order.
**Malay:**
124 Cinta tiga rupa ini di bawah sini diratapi: 125 sekarang aku ingin kamu mengerti tentang yang lain, 126 yang mengalir ke kebaikan dengan tatanan yang rusak.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
127 Ciascun confusamente un bene apprende 128 nel qual si queti l’animo, e disira; 129 per che di giugner lui ciascun contende.
query.result:
**English:**
127 Each one confusedly learns a good 128 in which the soul finds peace and desires; 129 therefore each one strives to reach it.
**Malay:**
127 Setiap orang dengan bingungnya mempelajari kebaikan 128 yang membuat jiwa tenang dan diinginkan; 129 oleh karena itu setiap orang berusaha untuk mencapainya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
130 Se lento amore a lui veder vi tira 131 o a lui acquistar, questa cornice, 132 dopo giusto penter, ve ne martira.
query.result:
**English:**
130 If slow love draws you to see him 131 or to acquire him, this frame, 132 after just punishment, will torment you.
**Malay:**
130 Jika cinta yang lambat menarikmu untuk melihatnya 131 atau untuk mendapatkannya, bingkai ini, 132 setelah hukuman yang adil, akan menyiksamu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
133 Altro ben è che non fa l’uom felice; 134 non è felicità, non è la buona 135 essenza, d’ogne ben frutto e radice.
query.result:
**English:**
133 Something else there is that makes man happy; 134 it is not happiness, it is not the good 135 essence, the fruit and root of every good.
**Malay:**
133 Ada hal lain yang membuat manusia bahagia; 134 itu bukanlah kebahagiaan, itu bukanlah kebaikan 135 esensi, buah dan akar dari setiap kebaikan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
136 L’amor ch’ad esso troppo s’abbandona, 137 di sovr’ a noi si piange per tre cerchi; 138 ma come tripartito si ragiona,
139 tacciolo, acciò che tu per te ne cerchi».
query.result:
**English:**
136 Love that abandons itself too much to it, 137 is lamented above us for three circles; 138 but how it is divided into three,
139 I am silent about it, so that you may search for it for yourself».
**Malay:**
136 Cinta yang terlalu menyerah padanya, 137 di atas kita ditangisi selama tiga lingkaran; 138 tetapi bagaimana ia terbagi menjadi tiga,
139 aku diam tentang itu, agar kamu mencarinya sendiri».
